headline: Major shareholder announcement
summary: In accordance with section 30 of the Capital Markets Act, Pandora A/S hereby announces that BlackRock, Inc. has notified the company of the following: On 18 June 2025, BlackRock, Inc. notified Pandora A/S that its aggregate holding of shares and financial instruments in Pandora A/S has increased to 10.00% of the total share capital and voting rights. This comprised: 7,506,627 shares, corresponding to 9.5% of the total share capital and voting rights (previously 8.74%), andFinancial instruments a

headline: Wall Street looks past 'blah FOMC' meeting as uncertainty keeps Powell on pause
summary: The Fed held rates steady and maintained its outlook for two cuts this year, but growing division among policymakers and mounting global uncertainties left markets largely unfazed.

raw.headline: Wall Street looks past 'blah FOMC' meeting as uncertainty keeps Powell on pause
raw.summary: The Fed held rates steady and maintained its outlook for two cuts this year, but growing division among policymakers and mounting global uncertainties left markets largely unfazed.
